adjectives.description: batlike (comparative more batlike, superlative most batlike)

entries.meaning: Having characteristics similar to those of a bat, usually used with reference to the flying mammal.
examples: […]  they cling, like creepers or women, to the nearest support, to fly from that corroding ennui and listlessness, those tumults of the mind, which flit batlike amid the golden-groined ceilings, and cannot be dispelled by the lictor guard.

entries.meaning: Similar to that of a bat.
